Articles.Content:
There are 4 SNSS Nightmares.

The one I used was untouched.

I'd love to know how the SNSS Nightmare became disentangled with the rockets from the Scout Sniper. One was lodged in way past the engine and into the guts of the craft, with the other still connected via phantom forces. The RCS capability of those combined should easily have stopped any accurate orbital maneuvering, bar hyper-edit.

Thanks in advance for the clarification

~Darth, on behalf of the Triple Liitto

Two ways. Whenever an object is in the world but too far away to physics load, it will phase through anything that's not a part if the same vehicle.

Sometimes this happens right as you open the game, meaning it's unavoidable if you trade save files.

The second way is time acceleration, which is not against the rules.

Battle Turn 3

No screenshots, as not much was done. Both snipers terminated due to damage rendering them useless to our cause.

The time for playing is up.

Come. And. Get. Us.

Persist

So, the classic argument over whether or not light rockets are worth it compared to i-beams...

In the words of the "Old El Paso" kid, "Why not both?"

http://i.imgur.com/xZaTfrb.jpg

This VTOL managed to hit a training target (wrapped in dual-layer armor) from the runway, when the target was parked up against the VAB.

Is that an ion vtol? What?

Is that an ion vtol? What?

It has a basic jet on the underside of the fuselage for VTOL thrust. The ions are for aesthetics and minor stability enhancements.
It's still cute.

Well, after all the talk of Helicopters and gunships and VTOls and the like, I began to wonder just how close to a helicopter gunship one could make in stock KSP. One thing led to another, and pretty soon, I have this:

The Bermuda Attack Copter, officially joining the line of the Triple Liitto, easily capable of hauling twice that missiles payload if needed.

Simulated control tail through RCS, SAS top propeller. Flies just like a helicopter. I'm quite proud of it.

We'd love a shot at a genuine surface battle, as most of our military force is there. If we're allowed to participate in multiple battles at once (currently in one Vs. Iamonfire), then we'll play

Oh crud, Script's message didn't come through till now. Will bow out if you guys want to have a battle

Who is "we"? There's no reason you can't do more than one battle at a time. We can do one if you want.

Who is "we"? There's no reason you can't do more than one battle at a time. We can do one if you want.

Ok! That would be good. "We" is the Triple Liitto, or a small group of forum users (Blufire13, Rexmundo, and Myself) Who develop crafts and strategize together. I am the pilot and main spokesperson, though I do try to be inclusive of my team mates. Any restrictions in mind for the land battle?

I'm going to bed right now, so we can figure it out in the morning
I'm back from Kentucky!!! Daemon I'm having problems with that persistence file. I'll set up and let you take first turn this time since I took too long :/

Kerbpaint has been working fine for me, but it could be the cause of all the crashes I've been having.

-------------

Does someone want to do a surface battle? All the ones I was doing seem to have gotten cancelled.

You can move the enemy tanks urself. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81647-WWII-Tank-Battles-%28Stock-Scenario-Game%29?highlight=tank+battles

Just download the save file, put in your tanks, move the Panther attack team, and then retaliate with ur team. Repeat until one wins.

I will get back to my PC on August 1st/2nd.

Why is everyone afraid of my Panthers?

It's not like this:

will happen to you....

Or maybe it will.....

:cool:
@iamonfire, do you realize it's your turn?
Battle anyone?
Me? You can set up rules and I will follow.

Is anyone else having serious editor bugs? I've been developing new crafts, but've had to restart regularly due to strange bugs, like something I've set aside becoming the main part, and the rest of the craft attaching to it, or stuff attaching magically when I try to delete them
It just happened on my 200t lifter -.- Dammit Squad please fix that annoying bug... I believe it's caused by part clipping as it's an old issue though.

Me? You can set up rules and I will follow.

-Lathe surface.

-Aircraft must land on water or naval vessels.

-Max 3 naval,1 aerial.

-Maximum mass 100.

-No K-drives
